column5: My girl went up to Sudbury this past long weekend to visit her parents who happen to be avid angler / hunters. She brought me back her Mom's Browning float tube and some new chest waders! I'm as happy as can be. Now that Highdrifter has schooled my arse in the art of steelheading, he'll hopefully teach me the fine art of float tubing as well! Those island pike and bass won't know what hit them!
